string.text: Armoured SEVA plates (upgrade)
An armoured plate for improving the properties of a SEVA suit.\n
鋼板

A set of steel plates of various lengths, widths, thicknesses and shapes. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] ・ %c[ui_gray_2] steel item
 %c[d_blue] ・ %c[ui_gray_2] used to improve the properties of light armour
高密度フレーム

A set of various frames and devices for improving the properties of protective suits. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] ・ %c[ui_gray_2] metallic and plastic items
 %c[d_blue] ・ %c[ui_gray_2] used to improve the properties of light armour
チェーンシャツ

Home-made chain shirt, made of small steel rings. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] ・ %c[ui_gray_2] steel item
 %c[d_blue] ・ %c[ui_gray_2] used to improve the properties of light armour

 %c[d_blue] ・ %c[ui_gray_2] used to improve the properties of light armour
